thread.title: Unfair mortgage rejections to be investigated by watchdogs
thread.title_full: Unfair mortgage rejections to be investigated by watchdogs

author: Dan Hyde
title: Unfair mortgage rejections to be investigated by watchdogs
text: Unfair mortgage rejections to be investigated by watchdogs Older borrowers, pregnant women and customers frozen out of the cheapest deals could get a boost The Mortgage Market Review (MMR) has been designed to prevent a repeat of the 2008 financial crisis Photo: Alamy Stock Photo By Dan Hyde , Consumer Affairs Editor 12:01AM BST 08 Oct 2015
